summary: The RTCP Revitalization Act amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to provide mandatory funding from the Commodity Credit Corporation for reimbursement payments to geographically disadvantaged farmers and ranchers. The bill removes a subject to availability of funds clause and modifies payment limitations. It allocates specific funding amounts from the Commodity Credit Corporation for this purpose, increasing annually from $10 million in fiscal year 2026 to $15 million in fiscal year 2031 and beyond.
